meanings.definition: A petition presented in opposition to another petition.
meanings.sent1: The judge received several counterpetitions from the community members.

meanings.sent4: The counterpetitions stood out like bold statements in the courtroom.
meanings.sent5: The stack of counterpetitions on the desk painted a clear picture of the dispute.
